parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Probably strengthened from the base of histemi; properly, to set fast, i.e. to repress.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To blame, find fault with, slander. From momos; to carp at, i.e. Censure.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: From diakonos; to be an attendant, i.e. Wait upon (figuratively) teacher; technically, to act as a Christian deacon.
Lavishness, lavish generosity, abundance, bounty. From hadros; plumpness, i.e. liberality.
